title: Person of Interest John Reese Lionel Fusco pilot scene
author: George Finch
comment: And look what great friends they became in the end. First impressions don't have to last after all...
damn John is one bad ass guy shootouts saving killing damn he had one bad life earlier when he met finch things got real.
They kind of re-created this scene with Fusco and that bad cop in the penultimate episode.
god Reese looks so young here

description: Person of Interest John Reese Lionel Fusco pilot scene
